executive_summary.overview: This is a Forensic Compliance Audit Report for Bajaj Auto Ltd.
executive_summary.key_finding: The company demonstrates a strong commitment to employee well-being and safety, but there are areas for improvement in supply chain compliance and gender diversity.

minimum_wage_status.evidence_snippet: All employees and workers are paid more than minimum wage.

equal_pay_status.evidence_snippet: Gross wages paid to females as % of total wages 3.9%

profit_sharing_status.evidence_snippet: No evidence of profit sharing found in the provided documents.

safety_systems_status.evidence_snippet: All our plants are certified with ISO 45001:2018 by M/S Bureau Veritas.

accident_records_status.evidence_snippet: Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR) (per one million-person hours worked) Workers 0.08

audit_scores_status.evidence_snippet: We have implemented various auditing and inspection processes to identify hazards and risks.

unionization_status.evidence_snippet: 73% of male permanent workers are part of an association or union.

collective_bargaining_status.evidence_snippet: This is exemplified by the timely signing of the Long-Term Wage Settlement at the Waluj plant.

disputes_strikes_status.evidence_snippet: No major disputes or strikes were mentioned in the provided documents.

leave_policy_status.evidence_snippet: As accumulated leave can be availed and/or encashed at any time during the tenure of employment, subject to terms and conditions of the scheme

retirement_benefits_status.evidence_snippet: Payment for present liability of future payment of gratuity is being made to approved gratuity fund

healthcare_welfare_status.evidence_snippet: Employees have access to state-of-the-art health and sports facilities.

due_diligence.evidence_snippet: We have a well-defined methodology, practices, and Supplier Code of Conduct (SCoC) to engage with all our suppliers in an ethical, responsible, fair, transparent, legal, and sustainable way.

forced_labor_policies.evidence_snippet: Human rights are an essential part of supplier code of conduct.

conflict_minerals.evidence_snippet: No mention of conflict minerals was found in the provided documents.

supply_chain_compliance.principal_employer_liability: The company appears to be taking measures to ensure compliance by value chain partners.

business_impact.operational_efficiency: Continuous evolution through TPM culture for excellence involving all employees to improve processes across the company.
business_impact.financial_performance: The company has delivered record financial results.
business_impact.brand_reputation: Bajaj Auto is recognised for its strong performance and leadership.
business_impact.innovation_rnd: The company is focused on creating its own cutting-edge technology to make affordable and scalable Electronic Powertrains and its controllers, HMI solutions, connectivity solutions and value-added features for the vehicles employing these technologies.

recommendations: Improve gender diversity across all levels of the organization.
Strengthen monitoring and enforcement of labor standards within the supply chain.
Enhance transparency in reporting on environmental and social impacts.
Continue investing in employee training and development programs.

supply_chain_profile.key_metrics: 100% of input materials and services are sourced from compliant suppliers
